title: MySQLDIVFunction

metadata.description: Learn about MySQLDIVFunction with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Integer division (10/5):
SELECT 10 DIV 5;

Definition and Usage
The DIV function is used for integer division (x is divided by y). An integer value is 
returned.
Syntax
x
DIV
y
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
x
Required. A value that will be divided by
y
y
Required. The divisor
Technical Details
Works in:
From MySQL 4.0
More Examples
Example
Integer division (8/3):
SELECT 8 DIV 3;

❯
★
+1

options: used for integer division (x is divided by y)

summary: This tutorial covers MySQLDIVFunction concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use MySQLDIVFunction effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of MySQLDIVFunction and how to apply it in your projects.
